alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 9:37AM CDT until April 10 at 7:24AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 57.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 68.7 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
